comment.author: 45586426@N06
comment._content:
Blackburn Buccaneer S.Mark 2B XW525 of the British Royal Air Force
Unfortunately on 04/04/1977 Buccaneer S2B XW525 with 208 Sqn RAF
crashed into Claerwen Reservoir west of Rhyader, Powys, Wales 
after loss of the tail when taking violent evasive action to avoid two Hunters. 
Both crew ejected safely 

nice scanned image
